DataSourcePortable.Name: crmchart1
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE,B.NOME AS FASE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_FASES B ON B.HANDLE = A.FASE
GROUP BY B.HANDLE, B.NOME
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> <Field Alias="FASE" From="A" Path="FASE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
